trans-unit.source: Determines the category of content that is adjacent to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> in a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina a categoria do conteúdo adjacente a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> is adjacent to the closing tag of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> adjacente à marca de fechamento de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> is adjacent to the opening tag of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> adjacente à marca de abertura de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> is adjacent to an embedded <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> adjacente a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> inserido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> is adjacent to the beginning or end of content.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> adjacente ao início ou fim do conteúdo.
